Huntington.Guyandotte, Huntington, West Virginia: Guyandotte is a historic neighborhood in the city of Huntington, West Virginia, that previously existed as a separate town before annexation was completed by the latter. The neighborhood is home to many historic properties and was first settled by natives of France in the early 17th century. Later, in the 18th century it became a town in the colony of, and later in the Commonwealth of Virginia immediately after statehood.
